abstract: Julia Moskin Recipe Lab column features recipe for ragu, Italian meat sauce, adapted from chefs Sara Jenkins and Nancy Harmon Jenkins with focus on fresh sausage.
lead_paragraph: Real Italian meat sauce, with rich taste and velvety texture, isn’t hard to make; it just needs a long time and a low flame. (Article plus video.)

headline.main: Ragù, a Meat Sauce Done Right

snippet: Real Italian meat sauce, with rich taste and velvety texture, isn’t hard to make; it just needs a long time and a low flame. (Article plus video.)
